resources.string: How to get Emerald Mod working:
Step 1: Make sure you have BlockLauncher installed. If not, you can get it from Play Store for free.
Step 2: Make sure that the Addons and ModPE Scripts are enabled in BlockLauncher Launcher Settings.
Step 3: Enjoy the mod and get some emeralds! :)
Please note that Emerald Mod only officially supports the following version of Minecraft PE:
